CustomField.description: If this field is set, it overrides the Group to which a Budget's Transactions will roll up for Group Actuals, even if its Project is in a different Group. Typically a Budget's Transactions roll up to its Project's Group. Note that either way, the Transactions will continue to roll up to the same Project's Project Actuals.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this field is set, it overrides the Group to which a Budget's Transactions will roll up for Group Actuals, even if its Project is in a different Group. Typically a Budget's Transactions roll up to its Project's Group.
CustomField.label: Override Project Group
